title: Got problems? FitGirl to the rescue!
body:
I’ve (kinda) finished my

Repacks Troubleshooting
page, which now is pretty comprehensive and covers most problems you may face installing my or other repacks. After that read, if you configure your PC once and for all, you won’t face any problems with any repacks at all. Not all issues are covered, but I’ll fill the dots in time.

Troubles? Shoot them!
